content: knit a cozy shawl in caron cakes this self-striping yarn makes it easy to change colors without having to weave in any ends knit in caron cakes zucchini loaf yarn needed 1 - caron® cakes™ yarn measurements approx 65 165 cm long x 16 40 5 cm at deepest point gauge 18 sts and 24 row = 4 10 cm in stocking st note shawl is knit in garter stitch pattern is also on yarn label
